trans-unit.source: Provides a set of <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> methods that extend the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一套<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>扩展的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类中的方法被定义为扩展<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>类</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>的扩展方法

trans-unit.source: This means that they can be called like an instance method on any <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，它们可以通过调用类似于实例方法对任何<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with normal priority on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on.
trans-unit.target: 与普通优先级线程上异步执行指定的委托，指定<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>上创建。

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher that executes the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 调度程序执行委托。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to execute, which takes no arguments and does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的委托，其中不带任何参数且不返回值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that represents the result of the BeginInvoke operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>表示 BeginInvoke 操作的结果的对象。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: action is .
trans-unit.target: actionis .

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified priority on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on.
trans-unit.target: 指定用异步执行委托指定的优先级的线程上，指定<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>上创建。

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher that executes the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 调度程序执行委托。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to execute, which takes no arguments and does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的委托，其中不带任何参数且不返回值。

trans-unit.source: The execution priority of the delegate relative to other pending operations in the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> event queue.
trans-unit.target: 相对于其他的委托中挂起的操作的执行优先级<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>事件队列。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that represents the result of the BeginInvoke operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>表示 BeginInvoke 操作的结果的对象。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.target: actionis .

trans-unit.target: priority不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate synchronously on the thread that the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on, and stops execution after the specified time-out period.
trans-unit.target: 在线程上异步执行指定的委托，指定<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>已创建，但指定的超时期限后停止执行。
